attributes.action: Make a requirement for all school to act upon logical opinions of its students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to ask for schools to have a requirementto act upon logical opinions of its pupils and lisen to what they want and need, and not through a biased teacher managed "School Council." 

The reason for this petition is that schools set up a school council, but only let the "quiet ones" go one them or just ignor what they want, and fob you off, and fob parents off, like removing classrooms to make a coffee shop. 

This petition is a Genuine pleade, and not to ask the prime minister to explain why it has fallen on deaf ears, and to give more flexibility and options to students now they have to remain in education longer.
